comment: Dr. Wallace is the best professor I have had this far.  She is very hardworking and will work with you on assignments if you need the help.  Would take her again in a heartbeat.
A great teacher. There is alot of reading to do but just keep up with it and you will do fine. You should be able to earn an A.
Great class, very easy. just do the assignments and you'll do fine. The tests are a breeze. Makes another educ class fun, instead of idiculous like the others.

If you think football coaches make the best classroom teachers, then you are in luck here. Just don't expect indepth and thoughtful ideas. The man has a chip on his shoulder -- not where he wants to be at this stage of his career & he takes it out on you!
